sentences.en: "Good, Mr Ryle," he said in English with a strong French accent.
sentences.cn: “好的，赖尔先生，”他用带有浓重法国口音的英语说。

sentences.en: Brand's keen ear caught the trace of an accent.
sentences.cn: 布兰德敏锐的耳朵听出了口音。

sentences.en: He answered our questions in English but with a thick accent.
sentences.cn: 他用英语回答了我们的问题，不过口音很重。

sentences.en: He had a pleasant, lilting northern accent.
sentences.cn: 他说话带着悦耳的、抑扬顿挫的北方口音。

sentences.en: He had a strong Irish accent
sentences.cn: 他有浓重的爱尔兰口音。

sentences.en: He has adopted the accent of a Second World War newscaster.
sentences.cn: 他承袭了二战时期播音员的口音。

sentences.en: Her Irish accent, after thirty-odd years in London, is undiluted.
sentences.cn: 她在伦敦呆了30多年，爱尔兰口音仍很浓重。

sentences.en: I've tried to pass off my accent as a convent school accent.
sentences.cn: 我努力将口音装成女修会学校的口音。

sentences.en: In the word ‘dinner’ the accent is on the first syllable.
sentences.cn: dinner一词的重音在第一音节上。

sentences.en: Joe had a low, guttural voice with a mid-Western accent.
sentences.cn: 乔说话声音低沉粗嘎，带着中西部地区的腔调。

sentences.en: Ms. Redgrave affects a heavy Italian accent.
sentences.cn: 雷德格雷夫女士假装带有浓重的意大利口音。

sentences.en: The Cockney accent was put on for effect.
sentences.cn: 这伦敦腔是为了给人以深刻印象而故意装出来的。

sentences.en: The man spoke with a Cockney accent.
sentences.cn: 那人说话带伦敦东区口音。

sentences.en: The voice was patronizing and affected, the accent artificial.
sentences.cn: 声音拿腔拿调的，听上去矫揉造作。

sentences.en: There is often a strong accent on material success.
sentences.cn: 经常大力强调物质成就。

sentences.en: They were amazed that I was talking in an Irish accent.
sentences.cn: 我说话带爱尔兰口音让他们感到很惊奇。

words.tran_cn: 重音的；根据重音定节奏的；有抑扬的
重读；强调；增强；加重音符号

trans.tran_cn: 口音,腔调，重音，重音符号
trans.tran_en: the way someone pronounces the words of a language, showing which country or which part of a country they come from
to make something more noticeable so that people will pay attention to it
to emphasize a part of a word in speech
